title: Chapter 163 - The Opposition's Cultivation
body:
Chapter 163 - The Opposition's Cultivation


The pervert dragged Yao Si into the middle of the red fluid. Surprisingly, she could breathe normally while submerged in the blood pool. Even though it seemed like a liquid, it felt as light as air. With the pervert clearing the way, the fluid lost all of its aggression, slipping past her as smoothly as silk.


Shortly after, they were at the heart of the fluid. Suddenly, a black patch appeared before them. The area emitted an eerie and sinister vibe, it… was the portal Yao Si had seen on the Heavenly Planet!


Her heart sank, and she took a few steps back. But with a forceful tug, the man pulled her forward, and the momentary imbalance knocked her off her feet. Just before she smashed into the ground, the pervert seemed to have sensed it, and like a gust of wind, he caught her.


“Are you blind? Can’t you walk properly?” He spat the moment he opened his mouth while glancing her up and down. “Hurry up! This old man won’t care even if you injure yourself.”


He turned and continued with dragging her forward. Still, it seemed like he had slowed down slightly.


The pervert brought them into the black portal, and Yao Si felt a shiver run through her. The next second, light poured over them, the glaring glow invading her eyes, forcing them shut.


“We’re here!” the pervert announced, finally releasing his grip on her.


Yao Si opened her eyes cautiously. They were in a fully furnished room that had been tided so meticulously that she could even see her reflection on the ground. The place was clearly meant for a long term stay.


Why did the pervert bring her here?


“You’ll be staying here until I finish my experiment!” He pointed toward the room before sweeping a glance at her. “Don’t worry, since you are the contractor, I won’t touch you, but you better not mess around or…”


He smirked threateningly, but when compared to the sinister demeanor from before, it fell short and skewed more toward… a false bravado.


A strange thought emerged in Yao Si’s heard. Perhaps his tolerance towards a ‘contractor’… was quite high?!


“What exactly is a contractor?” she asked.


“You don’t know?!” He stilled, glancing at her as though she was retarded.


“…”Er, was she supposed to know?


He waved his hand, not intending to explain. “Why don’t you ask the pure breed next time? I have no intention to educate others.” He glanced at the time on the optical computer. “I’m busy. We aren’t on the Red Planet anymore, so you better stay here obediently and don’t stir up any trouble.”


He gave her another warning look before turning to leave the room. The second he reached the door, he turned abruptly, his face scrunched up. After half a minute, he clenched his jaw and cursed under his breath, “F**k.”


He returned to the room, found a control table on the right and started to retrieve a bunch of items from it. He placed everything in front of Yao Si.


“It’s duck blood curd snacks, have them when you are hungry.”


“…”


“These are galactic novels, read them when you are bored.”


“…”


“These are games I downloaded. You can play them if you want to.”


“…”


“These are soft pillows, they’ll prevent a sore neck.”


“…”


“And this a flexible pet. You can alter its appearance to your preference!”


He then stuffed a woollen rabbit about the size of a dog into her embrace.


“…”


“Alright, that’s all. If you need anything else, just let me know.” He exhaled deeply as though having accomplished something grand and folded his arms to look at her inquisitively.


Half a minute later… the corners of Yao Si’s lips twitched. She recalled the question she had been inching to ask since a while ago.


“That…”


“What do you want?”


“Y-you’re sick, right?”


Wasn’t she a hostage? Why did he feel more like a nanny?


–


The pervert had issues, serious issues. It was the weirdest experience since she had been kidnapped to the foreign planet. From the moment of her arrival, he had been treating her unlike a captive that she had envisioned. No! It was the opposite extreme!. Rather than being called a hostage, it would be more appropriate to call her an ancestor, the kind that was worshiped.


He tended to even the most minute issues, taking extremely good care of her! Even though his words could be harsh and he often put on a scary front, he would answer any of her requests. He was so unbelievably obliging that it brought her back to…


“Are you f*cking retarded?” He bolted into the room like a tornado/ “Didn’t I already prepare food? What do you mean by only craving for ‘spiritual beast blood curd’? Will it kill you to eat something else? Don’t you know my experiment is currently in a crucial stage so I can’t be disturbed? How can you call for me at such a time? Are you seeking death?” He seemed like a firecracker that had been lit up as he jumped about in exasperation.


Then, with a loud thud, he slammed a bottle of the Red Planet’s hot seller—’spiritual beast blood curd’.


-_-|||


“Thank you.” Yao Si completely disregarded his rage, gulping the entire bottle down in one go. Mmh, not bad! With just one sip, she could tell that it had been manufactured just that day. “Oh right, pervert, did you only bring one bottle?” She swept a suspicious glance at him.


“My name is Lin Long! Haven’t I already told it to you a thousand times? If you call me pervert one more time, I’m going to make you perish!”


He grew increasingly aggravated. It looked as though smoke was about to emit from his head at any moment. Even so, he didn’t forget to retrieve another three identical bottles of ‘spiritual beast blood curd’ from his optical computer’s storage. With another thud, he slammed them in front of her once more. “I hope it kills you!”


Yao Si immediately unscrewed another bottle; she was starving. She seemed to have gotten immune to Lin Long’s continuous threats.


She gulped down the three bottles, but just as she was about to reach for the last bottle, he snatched it away.


“Do you really intend to kill yourself?!” He glared at her while unscrewing the bottle. “Are you dumb? This drink is ‘cooling’, so you’re going to die from diarrhoea!”


“I’m a bloodling, so how can I die from diarrhoea?!” Yao Si rolled her eyes before sweeping a look of disdain at the other dishes. “Besides, what’s with all this fast food? Back at home, Mu Xuan would always cook my meals yet I didn’t once complain to you. Who are you to pity me!”


“Get lost, why should I pamper you when I’m not even your contractor?” Lin Long downed the bottle in his hand and turned to the chair at the side for an apron before fastening it around himself. “Are you the only one with a contractor? Are you guys the only ones that can cook? Heh! What’s the big deal with knowing how to cook? I can cook too! Today, I’ll have you dumb bastard open your eyes and understand the true meaning of culinary skills.” After saying that, he busied himself in the kitchen.


“…”


╮(╯﹏╰）╭


Such upright behavior… Was he alright?


Yao Si sighed, turning to look at the busy figure. She then said, “I want it extra spicy!”


“Shut up!”
